about_the_game:
🏠 Welcome to "Will I Survive Tonight?" 🌙
100 ACHIEVEMENTS TO UNLOCK!

You've unexpectedly inherited a seemingly tranquil abode nestled in the eerie solitude of Nowhere. But don't let the quiet facade deceive you; as night falls and you drift into slumber, the true nature of your inheritance reveals itself. Strange occurrences abound, and with each blink, a new guest appears at your doorstep, bearing unforeseen events.

🔍 Explore the Mysteries: Unravel the secrets shrouding your house as you navigate through a plethora of mysterious events. With a vast array of one hundred unique encounters awaiting, each night holds a mere 1% chance of unveiling its distinct tale.
  • Unlock 100 unique events. Each Night another NPC will show up at your door.
  • Meet Kings, Beggars, Traders, Killers, Monsters, Random People, and many more up to a hundred individuals.
  • You start with 100 Hunger points, each night you will lose 20 Points. If you don't find somebody to give you some food, don't worry you can always just die and try again. (don't try this in real life, I mean it.)
  • Multiple difficulty levels, so you can either play the Easy Route or the Impossible one.


⚒️ Crafting for Survival: Survival is not merely about enduring the night's onslaught; it's about resourcefulness and ingenuity. Utilize strategic crafting to combine items, unlocking new tools vital for your survival. But beware, the correct sequence is paramount; a wrong move could lead to dire consequences.
  • Find the perfect strategy to unlock the crafting systems and use your items in a better way to help your survival.
  • Some events might need to trigger other events before unlocking them, for example, you might need to unlock Stones before building a Stove.


🌌 Stay Vigilant: With every passing night, the challenges intensify and surprises lurk around every corner. Stay alert, anticipate the unexpected, and outwit the enigmatic forces that seek to keep you trapped within the confines of your legacy.
  • You might need to unlock/buy/craft special items to defend against some malicious events.
  • You might be robbed, stabbed, unalived by many events so be always vigilant and listen to your instincts.


🔑 Unlock the Truth: Escape is not only a matter of survival; it's a journey toward enlightenment. Venture beyond the walls of your inherited abode, uncovering the truths concealed within its darkened corridors. But be warned, the path to freedom is fraught with peril, and not all secrets are meant to be revealed.

Dare to confront the unknown, face the shadows that dwell within, and unearth the mysteries that lie beyond the walls. Are you prepared to embark on a journey where reality intertwines with nightmares? The choice is yours, but remember, in the realm of darkness, not everything is as it seems.
